data.text: @Lovelynikki221 Effective 01/11/2021, the DOT will no longer require air carriers accept the transport of Emotional Support Animals. Allegiant will no longer accept reservations which include Emotional Support Animals as of 01/11/2021. For more on this, check out: https://t.co/EqUA3t7oSs - C

urls.title: Passengers with Special Needs | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Allegiant is committed to providing passengers with special needs safe and comfortable travel. Learn more about procedures and approved devices for special needs passengers.

data.text: We love getting you boarded and on your way to the people and places you love! Where do you want to go this year? https://t.co/dBNdg8NpDz

@franciibaby Hello there! We are sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you need help with your reservation, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your confirmation number and the specifics of your request. A member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP. - C

@akuhl2 Hello Ann! We are sorry to hear about this. If you have a reservation with us and have specific questions regarding that reservation, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC A member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP. - C
@Coots_Shawn We look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you aboard! 😀 - C

SOARting out our to-do list for the week. What's at the top of yours? 📝

📸: klex_aviation https://t.co/8VceIwApu7

@Supodaddy Hi Jeffrey! We are so sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in your service. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and a member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP. - C
@jd_aero Hi JD. Please visit our public website to view all routes, dates and current pricing here: https://t.co/oCjuPDkPz7. -Jenna
@tcashballer21 Hi there! Please feel free to send us a DM, we'd be happy to assist. -Jenna
@lapeluax10 What an incredible picture. Thanks for sharing Jennifer! -Jenna
@Oshes Please feel free to send us a private message and one of our team members will be happy to assist however they can. - SG
@scott_wakser That's so wonderful to hear! Thanks so much for recognizing Mary Jo's hard work and dedication to her passengers. 🙌 - SG
@TheLuxeLady1 We're sorry to hear about your experience. Please feel free to send us a private message so we can gather more information about what happened. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@lapeluax10 Beautiful, beautiful shot, Jennifer! 😍😍 We’d love to feature it on our social channels, websites & in our advertising! If you agree, & are 18 years old or older, please reply with #YesAllegiant. Go here for full terms and conditions: https://t.co/nUwab0G18h

@CyndeeMN Hi Cynnamin. Allegiant welcomes small domestic cats and dogs on all of our flights. While you can purchase an additional seat for extra leg room, a pet is not permitted to travel in a seat. For more information, please visit https://t.co/OjNJjqJadt. -Jenna

urls.description: Allegiant permits traveling with pet dogs & cats on flights within the contiguous 48 states and Puerto Rico. Pet travel requirements, fees and pet carrier information.

data.text: @ccurtis70 Hi Carrie. We are sorry to hear that you had a less than enjoyable experience on your flight with us. We thank you for bringing this matter to our attention so that we may investigate and make any necessary corrections. - J
@lisahaynesRN Hi Lisa, we are so sorry to hear you are having difficulty booking. Please send us a DM and we'd be happy to assist with any trouble shooting tools. -Jenna
@BretHoovler You are most welcome Bret! Always here to assist in any way possible. Sending you as many virtual hugs possible! -Jenna 🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗 🧡 💙

We do routinely treat our aircraft with an advanced antimicrobial protectant that kills germs on contact for 14 days. We don't routinely have adorable 4-year-olds suit up to give it a try. But our friend Morgyn wanted to learn more, and we couldn't say no to that face! https://t.co/98ukoxDGzT
@quwanda27 The health and safety of our passengers and crew is always our first priority. Please send us a direct message. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@yearsley_ian Hi Ian! We are very sorry to hear this. Please feel free to send us DM and we would be happy to review your flight details. -Jenna
@JoannePrater Hi Joanne. Please send us a PM for assistance. -J

@tristelle4 🙌🙌 - SG
@walkersimasek Hi Walker! No, we do not require COVID-19 testing. But please check with the airport and state for their official requirements. - GM
@TinaaPinaa Hi Tina! Please send us a direct message with your confirmation number and email on file. We would be happy to look into this for you. - GM
@SunFound What a special day that was! Rhyan was a welcome addition to our flight deck! - SG
@JustinMeyerKC We LOVE hearing this! Thank you so much for the shoutout. 😎🛫 - C

@edwardsbradd Thank you for recognizing our efforts! 😊 - C
#togetherwefly

Meet Tyler. He is part of the ultra-dedicated team that braves sun, snow, wind, and rain every day to ensure the smooth departure and arrival of our flights. Our Ground Operations team is the last to send you off and the first to greet you when you arrive! #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/1INfxKV1vU

@Cincush Hi Ralph! If you are seeking assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the details of your request. A member of our team will be happy to review your options with you ASAP. - C
@J_NO_VLOGS We're excited to welcome you aboard! 🙂 💙 🧡 💛 - C
@piXieky5 Unfortunately no flights to Manila, but you can check out our route map at https://t.co/L9DVFmO8eG! - SG

urls.title: Cheap airline tickets, low cost nonstop flights | Route Map
urls.description: Allegiant offers the cheapest airfare with flights to over 100 US airports. Use the route map to view nonstop flights with the lowest flight prices.

data.text: @LuisDbu Hi Luis! While social distancing is top-of-mind for many, it's not always possible onboard an aircraft. For this reason, customers with concerns about being on a flight that cannot accommodate social distancing can request to be notified if their flight exceeds 65% capacity. - C
@katfernandezz Hi Katrina, We are very sorry to hear that you have not received your luggage. Please send us a DM so that we may look into this further. -Jenna
@Blondie_211 Hi Kelly! Thank you for bringing this to our attention, so that we may investigate and make any necessary corrections. - C
@rollingcoal67 We certainly hope to welcome you back onboard in the near future! -Jenna 🤗 ❤️

@PeasantsScream We see that you are not accepting Direct Messages at this time. If you wish to communicate with us through this platform, you will need to amend this setting. You are also welcome to call in to our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888, 24/7. - C
We always look forward to welcoming you on board! 👋 https://t.co/WM4QtM2QVZ
@celebritydymond We are sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@rancidray That's awesome! Nonstop is the only way to go! - SG
@WNYVFL This is a great suggestion! We certainly hope to be able to offer this service as time goes on. 😊 - C

@BetterFood4U Hi Rick! The safety and comfort of our passengers is our top priority. Customers with concerns about being on a flight that cannot accommodate social distancing can request to be notified if a booked flight exceeds 65% capacity. Learn more here: https://t.co/DepfqwKxTL - C
@sandkeyresort Thanks for the shout out, we love you! -J 🤗 💙
@rollingcoal67 We are always looking for new opportunities to add more flights to our schedules. Hopefully, as time goes on, we will be able to make your wish come true. 😊✈️ - C
@DavidKe04676799 Hi David! Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa with your request and delete this Tweet, in the interest of your privacy and security. 🙂 - C

Alright class, time for a #PopQuiz!

Would you rather:
A) Go to the airport, fly to another airport, have a long layover, then fly to your destination
or
B) Skip the hassle and fly nonstop

The choice is yours, but we say nonstop is the only way to fly!

📸: @midwestern_traveler https://t.co/dyeci5D56i

Did you know that Martin Luther King Jr. Day is the only federal holiday designated as a national day of service? It's observed as "a day on, not a day off" in memory of Dr. King's work and legacy. 

Find volunteer opportunities in your area by visiting https://t.co/X1e9TOilUW.

data.text: @epicvoicebrony We'll certainly have our teams take a look! Thanks for the suggestion! - SG

@Ricky55890078 Allegiant is recognized as one of the few carriers that features nonstop flights for affordable prices. At this time, we are not focused on offering connecting flights and personally do not recommend booking our flights to create a connection. - GM
@playdoughsnakes @Ricky55890078 See you soon! 😁💙🧡💛 - GM

@DaveJ1020 Hi David! Our current rate calendar goes through August 2021. For rates and availability beyond that, we recommend checking back on our official website periodically over the next 2-3 months. Plz send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC if you have further questions or concerns. - C

@hall0ween_madi Hi there! Seats are assigned automatically at the time of check-in for weight and balance purposes. However, crew members may reseat boarded customers to provide additional distancing when possible. If you have further questions or concerns, please send us a DM. - C
@labonte_jana Hi Jana! Please delete this Tweet and send us your information in a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC along with the details of your request. - C

Our VOC (volatile organic compound) filters play a major role in keeping the air you breathe on board fresh and sanitary. Exceeding HEPA standards, they remove even smaller particles. During cruise, filtered air is mixed with fresh air, which flows continuously. #GoingTheDistance https://t.co/gLjtVyPfca

@MichelleWhisks Hi there Michelle! If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the details of your request. A member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP. - C
@tragic_saturn Hi Rachel! Please send us a DM with your information and we would be happy to review. -Jenna https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC
@_Janayyyyyy We are very sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM if you are in need of assistance. -Jenna

@jrseif All customers are required to wear a face mask at all times. Our team members are committed to enforcing our policies and safety measures to the best of their abilities. If someone isn't wearing a face mask on your flight, please alert the nearest crew member immediately -J
@packalanche Yes, you certainly can! -Nicole
Taking off for the very first @GoldenKnights game of the 2021 season. How do you like our #GlowUp that goes up? 🛫 https://t.co/EACH7fAPoV

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Glow Up: Britain's Next Make-Up Star
entity.description: Host Maya Jama is joined by make-up and beauty experts Val Garland and Dominic Skinner in the search for Britain's next star make-up artist. During each series, 10 aspiring make-up artists live and work together, while they also compete in a series of tricky challenges to demonstrate their make-up skills to the judges. The artist who is finally crowned the winner of the contest is awarded with a sought-after contract to work with some of the world's biggest, and most well-known, names in the make-up industry.

@asphyxious1 While I cannot comment on specific personnel matters, I can tell you that Allegiant does not tolerate harassment, discrimination, bullying, or any such speech or conduct in the workplace. All reports are taken very seriously and investigated and addressed as appropriate.  - GM
@buubbbbaa Hi there! We're sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a direct message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - Lupe
@Tishie75 In that case, please send us a private message so one of our team members can assist you! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@Tishie75 Hi Tish, you can change or cancel your booking online any time before your flight's departure without fees. If you cancel the booking, a full travel credit voucher will be issued, valid for two years from the original booking date to apply towards new bookings. -Nicole
@cherielight Hi Cherie! At this time we do not have a release to when the calendar will be updated. - Lupe

@thomwga While I cannot comment on specific personnel matters, I can tell you that Allegiant does not tolerate harassment, discrimination, bullying, or any such speech or conduct in the workplace. All reports of such conduct are taken very seriously and investigated and addressed. - GM

@mranweiler @montereyairport @flypdx That's a great question, Mike! Every passenger may bring one personal item (7 in. x 15 in. x 16 in.) for free. However, fees can vary for additional bags depending on when you're traveling, how big your bag is, and when you purchase it. Learn more at https://t.co/hnEUkf52FG. - SG
